divs: sighting detailswe were at a 4th of july party, watching fireworks outside. i went with my sister and nephew. there were about 20 of us and we all seen these weird objects that looked like: orange oval w\ flame coming from bottom. at first we thought they were planes or maybe someone was playing a tricks with something but there were too many of them. and they came over mtn (montage mtn) across the city of scranton then disappeared. plus they were very slow. i also have some pictures of the objects. my nephew is 13 yrs old and he is interested in giving his opinion on this matter.
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Scranton
There were no other sightings in Scranton on or around July 4th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
